name: Create clip generation workflow
goal: Document the new `clip.sh` script in the skill's SKILL.md

name: Prompt Caching Implementation
goal: Reduce token costs by caching static prompt prefixes

name: Dynamic Tool Filtering
goal: Reduce context window pollution

name: Hierarchical Decomposition
goal: Improve autonomy via specialized sub-crews

name: Structured Memory Architecture
goal: Better long-term recall and organization

name: Implement Generator-Critic Loop
goal: Improve code/draft quality via peer review

name: Hybrid Memory Retrieval (BM25)
goal: Improve recall accuracy for specific IDs/names

name: Systematic Learning (Post-Mortems)
goal: Prevent task recurrence failures

name: Evaluate SQLite Migration for Podcast Tracking
goal: Assess moving podcast guest lists and episode metadata into a dedicated podcast.db.

name: Evaluate SQLite Migration for System Logs
goal: Assess moving raw command/error logs into a history.db for better failure analysis.

name: Evaluate SQLite Migration for Memory
goal: Assess moving MEMORY.md and curated memories into a structured SQLite table for better indexing and retrieval.

name: Develop Management Dashboard
goal: Create a web-based dashboard to view Mission Control data directly from phone or computer.
next_step: Implement Push-to-GitHub trigger in DB update scripts

name: Deploy Dashboard to Vercel
goal: Host the management dashboard on Vercel with a secure sync mechanism for the SQLite DB.

name: Develop Streamlit Management Dashboard
goal: Create an interactive Streamlit dashboard with summary and full DB views (filtering/sorting) and deploy to Streamlit Cloud.

name: Upgrade Vercel Dashboard to Interactive
goal: Add interactive filtering, sorting, and a full DB explorer to the Next.js dashboard.

name: Implement Integrated Deployment & CI/CD Logs
goal: Enable Jarvis to monitor, debug, and force-deploy web apps directly (e.g., Vercel/GitHub Actions) to avoid push-and-pray loops.
next_step: ✅ Fixed build error (missing CSS import). Stability Mode now live.

name: Implement RAG for Token Optimization
goal: Reduce context bloat by implementing a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for memory and documentation.

name: RAG: Memory Retrieval & Distillation
goal: Implement semantic search over daily logs and long-term memory to pull only relevant snippets into context.
next_step: Analyzing current MEMORY.md and log structure for RAG indexing prototype.

name: RAG: Documentation & Skill Indexing
goal: Index local docs and skills to allow the agent to retrieve instructions only when needed.
next_step: Map out critical documentation paths and skill locations.

name: RAG: Automated Maintenance (Janitor)
goal: Create a background process to summarize, clean, and re-index data to prevent retrieval bloat.
next_step: Define distillation rules for old logs.

name: Research Floquet Analysis for Phased Arrays
goal: Identify state-of-the-art Python-based Floquet analysis methods and research papers.
next_step: Deriving the Active Reflection Coefficient (ARC) from Floquet scattering parameters to enable scan blindness visualization.

name: Draft Prototype: Meep Floquet S-Parameter Extraction
goal: Create a working Python script that uses Meep to extract S-parameters for a single unit cell across multiple scan angles.
next_step: Implemented DiffractedPlanewave modal expansion in prototype. Ready to map results to Active Reflection Coefficient (ARC).
